#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,x,i,count;
    string str;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    count=0;
    cin>>str;
    for (size_t i= str.find("01") ; i!=string::npos ; i=str.find("01",i+2))
    {
        ++count;
    }
    cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
